message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe in valuing transparency and fairness in transactions, which is why we have tailored our offer specifically for you. Considering the significant value this product holds for both of us, we propose a purchase price of $1350000. This offer reflects a fair compromise between its worth to us and the value it holds for you. We are confident that this price will not only be beneficial for you but also ensure a mutually satisfactory transaction. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any other way we can assist you in making your decision.
